METHOD.name: getDefault
METHOD.DESC: This method will return an object that represents the default instance of the API Class. For example Camera.getDefault will return a Camera object that represents the default camera.

METHOD.name: setDefault
METHOD.DESC: This method allows you to set the attributes of the default object instance by passing in an object of the same class.

PARAM.name: defaultInstance
PARAM.DESC: An instance object that is of the same class.
